response.original_title: 「呪霊ハンター」闇から来た女 封印された怪奇事件ファイル
response.overview: Super A-class ghost hunters go to the scene of a swirling grudge and uncover the truth behind the case!　A love hotel rumored on the Internet to be haunted by the ghost of "The Woman from the Darkness. A hellish scene awaits the haunted spirit hunters there. ...... Stare at the Loneliness" The darkness of the modern age of solitary death. What does the figure of the girl who survived show?　The Pot of Malice" The mass fainting incident on a school excursion bus is a mystery in the history of ghost cases. What is the truth behind the mystery? ......
response.title: "Jurei Hunter" Yami Kara Kita Onna Fuuin Sareta Kaiki Jiken File
